short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows lyrics in an overlay window of the song playing on YouTube Music.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you fancy singing-along to a song you're playing on YouTube Music, no matter what software you're using or while enjoying your favorite video game?

This extension works together with an application to show you the synced lyrics of the track playing on YouTube Music.

Works best with English songs.

★ Installation
• Download the latest executable from https://github.com/iamdevdiv/Music-LAW-Lyrics-AnyWhere/releases and run it to open the overlay window.
• Install this extension.

That's it! Play your favorite song on YouTube Music and synced lyrics will automatically pop up on the overlay window.
